00028 class IpPacket
00029 {
00030         public:
00034                 const static unsigned int MAX_PACKET_SIZE;
00035 
00039                 const static unsigned int MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE;
00042                 IpPacket(const char* rawPacket, const unsigned int size);
00043 
00044                 const char* getPayload() const { return &(m_ip_packet->payload); };
00045                 const unsigned int getPayloadSize() const { return m_payloadSize; };
00046         private:
00047                 // this is not endianess safe!!
00048                 struct ip_header
00049                 {
00050                         uint8_t h_len:4;
00051                         uint8_t version:4;
00052                         uint8_t tos;
00053                         uint16_t total_length;
00054                         uint16_t ident;
00055                         uint16_t flags;
00056                         uint8_t ttl;
00057                         uint8_t proto;
00058                         uint16_t checksum;
00059                         uint32_t source_ip;
00060                         uint32_t dest_ip;
00061                 };
00062 
00063                 struct ip_packet
00064                 {
00065                         ip_header header;
00066                         char payload;
00067                 };
00068 
00069                 char *m_buffer;
00070 
00071                 ip_packet* m_ip_packet;
00072 
00073                 unsigned int m_size;
00074 
00075                 unsigned int m_payloadSize;
00076 };
